Description.Text: Stop at Dreamhouse Apartments Glasgow West End to discover the wonders of Glasgow. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, family room, laundry service, are at hand. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature internet access â€“ wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, heating, desk, telephone. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including garden, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Glasgow has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Dreamhouse Apartments Glasgow West End.
